query: query CarDetail($context: ContextInput!, $carDetailContext: CarDetailContextInput!) { carDetail(context: $context, carDetailContext: $carDetailContext) { carOfferToken vehicle { category description attributes { icon { id description } text } } vendor { image { url description } } priceSummary { lead { price { formatted currencyInfo { symbol } } qualifier } total { price { formatted currencyInfo { symbol } } qualifier } } } }
